word: AS TIME WENT ON THE CHURCH SCHOOL BOARD ARRANGED FOR AN INTERVIEW WITH ELLEN WHITE AT HER HOME EARLY THURSDAY MORNING, JANUARY 14, 1904, TO DISCUSS THIS QUESTION OF SCHOOL-AGE ATTENDANCE AND THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE CHURCH FOR THE EDUCATION OF YOUNG CHILDREN. W. C. WHITE SAW IT AS RATHER A LANDMARK MEETING THAT WOULD SET A PATTERN FOR OTHER CHURCH SCHOOLS ACROSS THE LAND.
